name: Shanti
description: A simple-minded magical girl. Once she sets her eyes on a target, she will go through with it no matter what it takes.

passiveSkill.name: Melee Magic
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Shanti appears, she grants Invincible for 15 seconds; her own DMG RES Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Justice Striker
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "A strike from the sky! Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage."}

specialSkill.name: Justice 5
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "A 5-strike combo with love. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing DEF by {placeholder} .Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Swing of Justice
normalSkill.description: Shanti swings her magical hammer. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: A strike from the sky! Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Shanti appears, she grants Invincible for 15 seconds; her own DMG RES Rate in battle increases by {placeholder}.
